flavor.reason: Some dishes were enjoyed, but many were found to be bland, over-seasoned, or poorly cooked.

freshness.reason: Frequent complaints about food quality, including wilted salads and improperly cooked steaks.

service.reason: Service issues include inattentive staff and long wait times, though some servers were friendly.

environment.reason: Concerns about cleanliness and noise, despite a generally casual atmosphere.

value.reason: Food quality and portion sizes did not justify the prices, despite occasional promotions.
